thread.title: FIRST PIC: Cambridge student who burned £20 note slap bang in front of homeless man
thread.title_full: FIRST PIC: Cambridge student who burned £20 note slap bang in front of homeless man

title: FIRST PIC: Cambridge student who burned £20 note slap bang in front of homeless man
text:
Published 9th February 2017 
SWNS/ SG FIRST PIC: Ronald Coyne (right) set fire to a £20 note in front of a homeless person “This is disgusting and abhorrent behaviour ” Cambridge University Conservative Association 
Smug student Ronald Coyne, who is part of the Scottish National Party’s extended family, waved the note in the air before putting a flame to it in the shocking footage. 
The Cambridge University Conservative Association has booted the teen out of its organisation after seeing the footage. 
Reps slammed the clip as “abhorrent and repugnant” after the video was circulated on Snapchat. 
SG RELATIVE: Ronald Coyne is a Law student at Cambridge University 
Coyne is a first year Law student at Pembroke College. 
He is the nephew of the First Minister’s sister-in-law’s ex-husband. 
A Scottish Government spokesperson said today: “There are six or seven degrees between them. 
“He might go around saying he is her nephew but he’s not. 
“She has no recollection of ever meeting him. 
SWNS SCENE: There have been calls for Ronald Coyne to be booted out of university Posh students bare all in charity calendar Wednesday, 26th October 2016 Stunning students at Cambridge University got naked in the name of charity for a posh but raunchy calendar. 1 / 10 
“Somewhere along the line his dad is the brother of the ex-husband of the sister of the First Minister’s husband.” 
Cambridge University Conservative Association released a statement about the incident. 
It read: “There is no room for people who behave like that in our Association, any other University Association, or frankly our University. 
“This is disgusting and abhorrent behaviour occurred completely independently of CUCA, and did not take place before or after any CUCA event.” Related videos
